reviews.review: Jebac zjeby na wh, a tak to git

The only way to enjoy this game is to never spend a single cent on it. If you do, keep your stuff for like 5 years instead of selling, you will thank me later.

This game is a complete disaster. There is no control over community which results in these bizarre bans. 
For example, did you know that you can get banned for 7 days for kicking too many teammates? Without any initial warning?
